How It Works

Four Simple Steps to Healthier Skin

Our AI-powered platform makes understanding your skin simple and accessible to everyone.

01

Record a Video

Capture a 5-10 second video of the affected skin area. Our AI works best with good lighting and a steady hand.

02

AI Analysis

Advanced AI analyzes skin changes frame by frame, detecting patterns in redness, swelling, and texture.

03

Get Insights

Receive detailed insights about possible inflammation types, gentle care suggestions, and product recommendations.

04

Follow Your Plan

Get a personalized step-by-step routine that adapts based on your skin's response over time.

Features

AI That Understands Your Skin

Powered by advanced multimodal AI, Smart Skin Insight provides comprehensive analysis and personalized guidance.

Multimodal Video Analysis

Our AI analyzes skin changes frame by frame, detecting subtle variations in color, texture, and swelling patterns.

Temporal Reasoning

Track progression or improvement of inflammation over time with intelligent pattern recognition.

Natural Care Suggestions

Receive gentle, bio-friendly care suggestions alongside common over-the-counter product recommendations.

Nutrition Guidance

Get personalized dietary recommendations that support skin health and reduce inflammation naturally.

Adaptive Routines

Your care routine adjusts automatically based on observed skin response in follow-up videos.

Privacy First

Your videos and data are encrypted and never shared. You control your information at all times.
